comment._content: Actress: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frances_Starr In spring 1915 she was in "Marie-Odile" at the Belasco Theatre: www.ibdb.com/production.php?id=8129

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for providing identification and context. We can add some information when we next update the description. (Frances Starr appears in several contexts in the Prints & Photographs Online Catalog -- see: www.loc.gov/pictures/search/?q=%22frances%20starr%22&... )
